segments.text: Thank you very much for everything you have done for me during my stay in China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I must thank you again for your generous help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The help is mutual . I must thank you to see me off . My wife and I will be looking forward to seeing you . You will come to see us , won't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I promise I will take the first chance to call on you . Please send your wife with my best regards .
segments.speaker: S2
